MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Coaltown of Wemyss. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:24pm. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30am. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:00pm on Saturday, 24 April 2021
